name: Planet Survival
description:
Hi I'm Sean, and this is a new game that I'm developing by myself so the development is going to take some time.

So I still don't know what this game is going to be about. I'm thinking about a survival game between planets and that you can explore them and survive but it can be changed later.

For now I've made some basics of the game. You can walk around using WASD keys and switch planets with the G key. You can break trees and stones and you'll see how much you have in the top left corner of the screen.

Please leave a feedback for the game or any suggestions so that I can improve the game and make it better for all of you.

Controls:
  • WASD Keys to move around
  • G key for switch planet
  • 1 to build a floor, 2 to build a wall and 3 to build a pillar, 4 to build a door frame.
  • Press Q to stop building.
  • Left click of the mouse to confirm build or to attack.
  • Esc to open pause menu.
Things that have been changed or have been added since last version:
  • Pause menu added.
  • Start scene added.
  • When you don't have enough materials to build something, so the object will be yellow.
  • You can build now a door frame.
